name: SOLS Energy Sdn Bhd.
description: Provider of solar energy products and services intended to promote the use of green energy. The company offers grid-tied, off-grid, and hybrid solar thermal and water pump systems that facilitate reducing carbon dioxide emissions, enabling customers to get cost-effective access to clean energy.
one_liner: Provider of solar energy products and services intended to promote the use of green energy. The company offers grid-tied, off-grid, and hybrid solar thermal and water pump systems that facilitate reducing carbon dioxide emissions, enabling customers to get cost-effective access to clean energy.
